title: Gyges No Futari
alternative_title: ギュゲスのふたり ; ギュゲスのふたり －透明な能力者たちの破滅譚－ ; Gyuges no Futari ; Gyges no Futari -Toumei na Nouryukusha-tachi no Hametsutan- ; Gyges Pair ; Gyges Pair -The Transparent Ability Wielders' Tale Of Destruction- ; Кольца Гига ; Two Psychics of Gyges
status: ギュゲスのふたり ; ギュゲスのふたり －透明な能力者たちの破滅譚－ ; Gyuges no Futari ; Gyges no Futari -Toumei na Nouryukusha-tachi no Hametsutan- ; Gyges Pair ; Gyges Pair -The Transparent Ability Wielders' Tale Of Destruction- ; Кольца Гига ; Two Psychics of Gyges
description:
Description :
        Todo, a manga artist, and Hinata, an assistant, have a common problem - a bad deal with the editor in charge. 
When such two people return home from the interview, they awaken to each other's abilities…

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: The Power Of Hope And Desperation
